title: I cannot download the game
body:
HI, 
its been quite a while now since i deleted the game due to distraction for the exams, but now i would like to get the game i downloaded the latest client and installed it, but when i have to install the actual game which can take a while for me it takes over 3 days to install and it has not yet, it gets stuck on 35% and it has been there for 3 days now. i have tried all the steps from your video available on you tube and it still does not work please fix this issue.

replies.body: If you haven't yet, make sure you're running the installer as admin. Double check the [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) as well to make sure it runs normally with all the permissions League needs after installing ^_^!
